mapper.insert: insert into user(id, password, is_teacher) values (#{id}, #{password}, #{isTeacher})
mapper.select: select u.id, u.password, u.is_teacher as isTeacher, u.avatar, u.name, u.gender, u.phone, u.email, u.dormitory, c.name as className, c.school, c.department, c.major, c.year from user u join class c on u.class_id=c.id where u.id = #{id}
